contents.defaultValue:
1. Common damage forms:

    • (STR/2) + 2

    • (STR/2) + 12 + 2d6

    • STR + 6

  2. Notes:

    • Use parentheses for halves (example: (STR/2)).

    • Division uses floor rounding.

    • You may add dice as Nd6 (example: 2d6).

contents.tooltip: Single Shot. Characters can fire one bullet as a simple action. The player totals their Firearms skill plus accuracy and can use that many dice from their Finesse pool to fire the weapon.
contents.label: SS

rhs.tooltip: Single Shot. Characters can fire one bullet as a simple action. The player totals their Firearms skill plus accuracy and can use that many dice from their Finesse pool to fire the weapon.
rhs.label: SS
